entry.summary:
RT Starlink Second-gen satellites represent a step forward in Starlink capability with key technologies to provide ~4x more capacity per satellite than earlier iterations. This means Starlink can provide more bandwidth with increased reliability and connect millions of more people around… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1659579099436949504
